sticky-image-description: Help raise $125,000 in support of Spotlight PA's vital investigative journalism for Pennsylvania as part of our end-of-year fundraising campaign.
support-text: Huge stories will shape Pennsylvania’s future next year, and now is the time to make an end-of-year investment in Spotlight PA’s unique, independent investigative reporting. We're more than halfway to our goal of raising $125,000 by 11:59 p.m. Dec. 31. Can we count on your support? As a special bonus, all gifts made right now will be DOUBLED thanks to a challenge grant from the Lenfest Institute for Journalism. Unlike many others, Spotlight PA has no shareholders, no billionaire owner, no pressure to turn a big profit. Just the determination and passion to deliver high-impact investigative and public-service reporting for Pennsylvania, always free from commercial or political influence. We provide our journalism for free, for everyone to read, because we believe in information equality. Greater numbers of people can keep track of the issues and events shaping our state, understand their impact on people and communities, and become inspired to take meaningful action. Millions can benefit from open access to quality, truthful news, regardless of their ability to pay for it. Every contribution, however big or small, powers our journalism in tight economic times and sustains our future. As you consider your end-of-year giving, please support Spotlight PA by making a tax-deductible gift today. If you can, consider supporting us with a regular amount each month. And don’t forget – every dollar contributed before Dec. 31 will be DOUBLED. Will you take a moment now to ensure this important work can continue?
topper-image-description: Help raise $125,000 in support of Spotlight PA's vital investigative journalism for Pennsylvania as part of our end-of-year fundraising campaign.
